lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Phyllis. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Phyllis Bernstein, beloved wife of the late Irving. Her commitment to the Jewish community has impacted many lives. We extend our deepest condolences to Phyllis's children, Barbara Bloom (Myron) and Steven (Diane); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; John S. Ruskay, Executive VP & CEO
